addUp(XSTNode) - Method in class com.irahul.XST.XST

X

XSGrammar - class com.irahul.XST.XSGrammar.
XML Schema Grammar Def, how much of XML is understood by XST, To extend it you need to create the approriate sub-classes of XSTNode and modify XST.createTree(DOM) accordingly.
XSGrammar() - Constructor for class com.irahul.XST.XSGrammar
Only needed for debug, otherwise dont need to create this object
XST - class com.irahul.XST.XST.
XML Schema Tree
XST() - Constructor for class com.irahul.XST.XST
Constructor for class XST It contains a pointer called current pointing to the present XSTNode in question To traverse the tree, call the appropriate methods which in turn move current.
XSTConstants - class com.irahul.XST.XSTConstants.
XML Schema Tree Constants, Document describes current implementation restrictions.
XSTConstants() - Constructor for class com.irahul.XST.XSTConstants

XSTV - class com.irahul.XST.XSTView.XSTV.
Constants for XSTV
DEPTH INDICATORS-colors used
0 BLACK
1 BLUE
2 CYAN
3 GREEN
4 YELLOW
5 ORANGE
6 RED
7 MAGENTA
8 PINK
Values beyond 6 have not occured as yet and higher ones can be easily added
XSTV() - Constructor for class com.irahul.XST.XSTView.XSTV
